name: Healing Ointment
typesDescription: A lightweight, non-greasy ointment designed to lock in moisture and promote healing. Suitable for all skin types, especially dry and sensitive skin.

features.fearutesDescription: Water-resistant, Non-comedogenic, Fragrance-free, Ideal for all skin types, Suitable for use under makeup, Dermatologist-tested.

use: Healing Ointment is ideal for restoring moisture to severely dry or cracked skin. Its protective barrier helps prevent moisture loss, making it effective for skin prone to irritation and dryness. Perfect for use on hands, elbows, and heels, the ointment is non-greasy and fast-absorbing. Apply a small amount to the affected area as needed, especially after bathing or washing. Safe for use on the face and body, it is recommended for all skin types, particularly sensitive skin.
